Title: Ethno-memorial complex «Atameken»
Description: An open-air museum representing the cultural and architectural diversity of Kazakhstan, showcasing miniatures of famous buildings and landmarks from across the country.

Title: «Nur-Alem» Future Energy Museum (EXPO)
Description: A museum dedicated to energy and sustainability, showcasing innovative technologies and ideas for the future.
Schedule: Пн: технический день, Вт-Пт: с 10:00 до 20:00

Title: Theater of animatronics «Jungle»
Description: A unique theater featuring animatronic animals and creatures, providing entertainment and educational experiences for visitors.

Title: The Palace of Peace and Reconciliation
Description: A symbolic building designed to promote global peace and understanding, hosting international conferences and events.

Title: National Museum of the Republic of Kazakhstan
Description: The largest museum in Kazakhstan, housing a vast collection of artifacts and exhibits that showcase the history and culture of the country.

Title: «Astana-Baiterek» Monument
Description: An iconic monument and observation tower symbolizing the unity and progress of Kazakhstan, offering panoramic views of the city.

Title: The Oceanarium «Ailand»
Description: An aquarium showcasing a wide variety of marine life, providing educational opportunities and promoting conservation.

Title: The Ferris Wheel «Ailand»
Description: A Ferris wheel offering panoramic views of the city and the surrounding area, providing a unique perspective on the landscape.

Title: Exotarium “Ailand”
Description: An exotic animal park featuring a wide variety of species from around the world, offering educational programs and conservation initiatives.

Title: Museum of Saken Seifullin
Description: A museum dedicated to the life and works of Saken Seifullin, a prominent figure in Kazakh literature and culture.

Title: “Hall of gold” in the National Museum of the Republic of Kazakhstan
Description: An exhibit showcasing a collection of gold artifacts, highlighting the rich cultural heritage of Kazakhstan.
Schedule: Пн: технический день, Вт-Вс: С 10:00 до 18:00

Title: Palace of Independence
Description: A grand building serving as a symbol of Kazakhstan's independence and sovereignty, hosting official ceremonies and events.
Schedule: Пн: технический день, Вт-Вс: с 10:00 до 18:00

Title: Arc de Triomphe «Mәңgіlіk El»
Description: A monumental arch commemorating the independence and unity of the Kazakh people, serving as a symbol of national pride.

Title: Museum of the First President of Kazakhstan
Description: A museum dedicated to the first President of Kazakhstan, Nursultan Nazarbayev, showcasing his life, achievements, and contributions to the country.
Schedule: Пн: технический день, Вт-Вс: с 10:00 до 18:00

Title: Nazarbayev Center
Description: A cultural and educational center dedicated to promoting the legacy and vision of Nursultan Nazarbayev, featuring exhibitions, conferences, and events.
Schedule: Пн: технический день, Вт-Вс: с 10:00 до 18:00

Title: Military-historical museum of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Kazakhstan
Description: A museum showcasing the military history of Kazakhstan, featuring exhibits related to the country's armed forces and conflicts.
Schedule: Пн: технический день, Вт-Вс: с 10:00 до 18:00
